metadata.title: CVE-2009-0165 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description:
Integer overflow in the JBIG2 decoder in Xpdf 3.02pl2 and earlier, as used in Poppler and other products, when running on Mac OS X, has unspecified impact, related to "g*allocn."

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2009-0165` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

xpdf - 3.02-2
No subscription required

notes.note: jdstrand> per mdeslaur, poppler and xpdf not-affected sbeattie> ipe uses system pdflatex ccdm94> poppler 0.67.0 and forward uses xpdf 3.03+.

criterions.comment: xpdf package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.02-2').
